Title: Windows Aero Form Applicaton for VB.NET
Description:
This is a pre-made template that you can make your app on just like making it in Windows Forms Application but this template was made with WPF Application.
plus all the aero API are taken care of so you dont need to set then aero affects.
That is for VB.NET
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a pre-made template that you can make your app on just like making it in Windows Forms Application but this template was made with WPF Application.
plus all the aero API are taken care of so you dont need to set then aero affects.
That is for VB.NET






Windows Aero Form Application

How to install**

1. Download the zip file
2. move the .zip file to "C:\Users\"YourNameHere"\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Templates\ProjectTemplates"

if it does not work move the .zip file to

"C:\Users\"YourNameHere"\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Templates\ProjectTemplates\Visual Basic"

where it says "YourNameHere" i mean your name that you have as your user name for the computer

plus the template only work for Vista or higher

because windows xp does not have aero

you dont need to go into the zip file to access it because its a template its just like you are making a new project in visual Sudio Basic


How To Install the Bundle version**

1. Download the zip file
2.Open the .rar file and extract Aero Form.zip to "C:\Users\"YourNameHere"\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Templates\ProjectTemplates\Visual Basic"
3.extract Aero Form item to "C:\Users\"YourNameHere"\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Templates\ItemTemplates\Visual Basic"

if it does not work extract Aero Form.zip to

"C:\Users\"YourNameHere"\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Templates\ProjectTemplates\

if it does not work extract Aero Form item.zip to

"C:\Users\"YourNameHere"\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Templates\ItemTemplates\

where it says "YourNameHere" i mean your name that you have as your user name for the computer

plus the template only work for Vista or higher

because windows xp does not have aero

you dont need to go into the zip file to access it because its a template its just like you are making a new project in visual Sudio Basic
